item.title: Working with Quarto and Hugo
item.description:
Quick intro to Quarto

While exploring the offerings of Fast.ai, I got introduced to Quarto, a handy-looking open-source publishing system.

In practice, Quarto allows publishing your work – were it code, data analysis, or just plain markdown text – in a variety of formats including PowerPoint, HTML, and so on.

As a practical example I decided to try Quarto out by creating a very quick data exploration notebook as the system has a nice integration with Hugo.
